content.raw:
Nonetheless, I have another problem, which is the joint_trajectory action server/client that speak to the low-level joint controller no longer work. I think this has to do to a 'new' implementation of a shim controller to do PID servoing". This may be the culprit. See: #!/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/451/update-shim-controller-to-do-pid-servo/diff.

Not sure about that yet.
content.html:
Nonetheless, I have another problem, which is the joint_trajectory action server/client that speak to the low-level joint controller no longer work. I think this has to do to a 'new' implementation of a shim controller to do PID servoing". This may be the culprit. See: #!/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/451/update-shim-controller-to-do-pid-servo/diff.

Not sure about that yet.
